questions.prompt: How many U.S. Presidents have been assassinated while serving as President?
questions.answer: Four - Abraham Lincoln, James Garfield, William McKinley and John F. Kennedy

questions.prompt: What is the sum of all integers from 1 to 999 inclusive?

I'm thinking of a secret whole number between 1 and 1,000 — inclusive. You're allowed to ask yes-or-no questions, but only of the form: "Is your number greater than X?" What is the smallest number of questions you would ever need to guarantee you can find my number, no matter what it is?
Which two Zone 1 stations in London have direct connections to 3 different London airports?
Which American celebrity is incorrectly thought to have helped in bringing down the Berlin Wall?
questions.notes: He did perform there in 1989 but the wall came down due to political changes in East Germany

questions.answer: High downforce - the downforce is more than the weight of the car

questions.notes: Annie Besant was the first woman overall (1917); Naidu was the first Indian woman (1925)

questions.prompt: At which ground did Kapil Dev score his iconic 175* in the 1983 Cricket World Cup?
questions.answer: The Nevill Ground at Tunbridge Wells
